review: I am not a connoisseur but nothing great about these strings.  They have pretty good sound but they seem to die quickly.
All adjustments keep position well.  About as sturdy as a tripod can be.  Exactly as advertised, no complaints from this user.
I always seem to have to re-tune with the spring loaded capo's.  Rarely have to re tune with this one.  Highly recommend.
These picks break way too easy.  I only play a few times a week but they dont seem to last long when playing for more than a few hours at the time.
Low strings do not get picked up very well but is ok if you are just strumming. For the price it is a good deal.
